titleStmt.title: A copy of the Earle of Marleborough's letter to Sir Hugh P. Dated aboard the Old James, April 24. 1665
titleStmt.author: Marlborough, James Ley, Earl of, 1618-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for G. Bedell, and T. Collins, near the Middle-Temple Gate in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
